data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Centre-Nord, Burkina Faso who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Centre-Nord, Burkina Faso
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Centre-Nord who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,203,100 citizens of the the state of Centre-Nord.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Centre-Nord, Burkina Faso that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Dogose people might believe through him.
Spirit, guide seekers in Centre-Nord, Burkina Faso to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 127,281 believers in Centre-Nord against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary:
the state of Centre-Nord, Burkina Faso has a population of 1,203,100.

We estimate Centre-Nord has 127,281 people who might know Jesus, 127,419 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 948,400 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Centre-Nord to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.
